title: UFYB 204: Elevating the Coaching Conversation by Embracing Complexity in Your Marketing
itunes:title: Elevating the Coaching Conversation by Embracing Complexity in Your Marketing
description:
Are you a coach or thought work aficionado who wishes the industry would step it up to meet the demands of a complicated multi-cultural world? In this special episode, you will get a preview of a brand new podcast that I created with my dear friend and fellow life coach, Simone Seol: Outside the White Box: Elevating the Coaching Conversation. This is the first episode of a limited series that will weave together unofficial expertise in history, sociology, anthropology and thought work to challenge the “white box” of mainstream self-development and elevate the coaching conversation. Tune in to learn all about how to elevate the industry by embracing complexity in your marketing.

 

Get full show notes and more information here: https://unfuckyourbrain.com/204

itunes:subtitle: Why you can make money without having to present an image of perfect certainty.
itunes:author: Kara Loewentheil
